title: How to build an electronic device which can alarm sound when gets in proximity of another device of the same type - Quora

response.answer_text: You can use ESP8266/32 with Bluetooth or WiFi mesh configuration. This configuration will make all devices in its proximity connect peer to peer and data can be transferred. Other alternatives are ZigBee and NRF radio. Hope this helps. If you need more details, feel free to drop a comment or DM.
Using existing devices, I would use bluetooth. Pair the two devices and write software that sets off a tone when they pair. Then when in range, they would set that tone off.
